title: Reverse Reverse Reverse
desc:
Post 587
- Can also be played after a Skip of any kind
- After being played, it will always be your turn or the turn of the player of the Skip until one of you has no playable cards
- Whoever runs out of playable cards must draw cards equal to cards that were played during the one on one
- If noone had played a Skip when you play this, the next player instead draws a Skip
